subject: Re: [Request received] ONC - New education page
preview: ##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support,  We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support, We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below: https://support.combinate.me/requests/30396/satisfaction/new/z5efEQLX7XEB2uvCFrqxN70Zr?locale=1176 Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about: Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 13 Jun 2025, 17:05 GMT+10 Hi Joel, Closing this ticket now as Rica has now responded to our ticket. Thanks for your help. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 13 Jun 2025, 17:05 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Thanks and I'll check with Rica regarding the progress. Thanks, Joel Maligalig support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
  • Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
  • Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request.
